advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed through improved input validation.

cves.credit: Maddie Stone of Google Project Zero

advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.
